title: Protein Bites
description: Protein bites with peanut butter, oats, and chocolate chips.
instructions: Place 11 cup Pyrex on a digital scale. Press 'On-Tare-Units' set units to grams. 'Tare' between all ingredients. Stir PB, chia seeds, honey, and vanilla extract. Then add oats and nuts. Stir. Refrigerate for 20 minutes. Roll into bites. Roll bites in mini chocolate chips. Keep in fridge.
